products.title: Splash Tiffany
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Tiffany Standard Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Splash Como
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Como Budget Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Budget Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
